I'm alone there's no god there where I' m,

Simargal.title: Congressum cum Daemone
Simargal.lyrics:
[
Simargal - Congressum cum Daemone

Hear, you who lives from that side of universe and endless kingdom where shines golden stars, there is endless ancient kingdom
Leave your body little man, lone less, pathetic life, which means nothing
Roam to the endless desert as long as you come to something, which I call home
From that side, from all dimensions, all universe and all times, from that side of abyss is our home, dusk and mystery, eternity without, and faithful
They came from dark endless stars which life breathings there breathe, the death unlimited rules
Don't try to across the abyss to reach the ancient kingdom if you don't want to fall in anger of gods
Know, there are many gods but only three of them keep the endless majesty of cosmic kingdom
Hastur, Azatoth, Narlatotep absolute rules. In that palace from their side arise the dark shadow, dusk ktulu, abyss dragon whose slept in cosmic deep
When sky opens thunder will across the sky and Earth will throw cold flames,
Know, our time has come and every god on Earth will be enslaved with our power
Because, don't ask a lot of and you mortal man who dares to try,
Key is hidden in your self.
That day weeping will desecrate the Earth and people will see a heart full of horror.

Simargal.title: Like a wind upon my face
Simargal.lyrics:
[
Simargal - Like a wind upon my face

The heat suffocates me, I don't fell the face, flesh and blood is here blinded by fear, and brain is burning is this time or just dreaming?
Today, tomorrow, always the same things can't see nothing but it, can't hear but sound of beating
Days have gone, the days has come kill me, ruin my mind, tears run I waited for you,
In purgatory but there was no sign of you
Minutes like hours, days like years in my mind only remembrances
I called the name days and nights but you is far away
Tell me, the nameless, what to do, hell put its hands on me, I saw it with my own eyes, It was different, not like in dreams
The small of carcass I felt, frightened to death, oh no, too late, it was over
I saw death in my dream open grave, eyes blood red, with poison inside horrible funeral, I was there, dream is real, dead body lies in grave, but spirit walking around
Shadows from the past on the streets and the horrible monster come in my empty soul
Last night death comes to me and said, "Hello, how are you?"
It's no matter, you're not real come, death, take your child!
You won't see the sun and sky again, never again.

- hvala Mordred

Simargal.title: Red forest of Maglay
Simargal.lyrics:
[
Simargal - Red forest of Maglay

You, creatures weak and enslaved, slaves of our satisfactions,
You probably hoped that your ridiculous adoring that you completely enjoy,
Angry about your shrines, our pride and our undribledness destroy them as soon as illusions satisfied sense.
Allure of imagination in that moment is turning into scorn followed with hate.
There's spice is dead, no one to say "Oh, Jesus, help me!"
Let your woman give her dark entrails, you and her naked body,
You will die, fort less, you whore.
So if you carry out and attack on us that will show your great pain.
Come here and leave your fear, pain into the red forests of Maglay.
I want that stupid creatures to finally know and to convince that the
Existence of God is immaturity.
It's a fairytale. Swindlers thought it up isn't it obvious?
An omnipotent God, why is he permitting all I do?
I'm the one weak person, like mouse against the elephant measuring
With his greatness, why is he permitting all that one weak person
Is profaning, provoking and defying him, us.
I do that all the time from evening till night.

- hvala Mordred
